00019 typedef FUObjectContainer<FCDPhysicsRigidBody> FCDPhysicsRigidBodyContainer;

00022 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDPhysicsModel : public FCDEntity
00023 {
00024 private:
00025     DeclareObjectType(FCDEntity);
00026     FCDPhysicsModelInstanceContainer instances;
00027     FCDPhysicsRigidBodyContainer rigidBodies;
00028     FCDPhysicsRigidConstraintContainer rigidConstraints;
00029 
00030 public:
00031     FCDPhysicsModel(FCDocument* document);
00032     virtual ~FCDPhysicsModel();
00033 
00034     // Returns the entity type
00035     virtual Type GetType() const { return FCDEntity::PHYSICS_MODEL; }
00036 
00037     // Direct Accessors
00038     FCDPhysicsModelInstanceContainer& GetInstances() { return instances; }
00039     const FCDPhysicsModelInstanceContainer& GetInstances() const { return instances; }
00040     size_t GetInstanceCount() const { return instances.size(); }
00041     FCDPhysicsModelInstance* GetInstance(size_t index) { FUAssert(index < instances.size(), return NULL); return instances.at(index); }
00042     const FCDPhysicsModelInstance* GetInstance(size_t index) const { FUAssert(index < instances.size(), return NULL); return instances.at(index); }
00043     FCDPhysicsModelInstance* AddPhysicsModelInstance(FCDPhysicsModel* model = NULL);
00044 
00045     FCDPhysicsRigidBodyContainer& GetRigidBodies() { return rigidBodies; }
00046     const FCDPhysicsRigidBodyContainer& GetRigidBodies() const { return rigidBodies; }
00047     size_t GetRigidBodyCount() const { return rigidBodies.size(); }
00048     FCDPhysicsRigidBody* GetRigidBody(size_t index) { FUAssert(index < rigidBodies.size(), return NULL); return rigidBodies.at(index); }
00049     const FCDPhysicsRigidBody* GetRigidBody(size_t index) const { FUAssert(index < rigidBodies.size(), return NULL); return rigidBodies.at(index); }
00050     inline FCDPhysicsRigidBody* FindRigidBodyFromSid(const fm::string& sid) { return const_cast<FCDPhysicsRigidBody*>(const_cast<const FCDPhysicsModel*>(this)->FindRigidBodyFromSid(sid)); }
00051     const FCDPhysicsRigidBody* FindRigidBodyFromSid(const fm::string& sid) const;
00052     FCDPhysicsRigidBody* AddRigidBody();
00053 
00054     FCDPhysicsRigidConstraintContainer& GetRigidConstraints() { return rigidConstraints; }
00055     const FCDPhysicsRigidConstraintContainer& GetRigidConstraints() const { return rigidConstraints; }
00056     size_t GetRigidConstraintCount() const { return rigidConstraints.size(); }
00057     FCDPhysicsRigidConstraint* GetRigidConstraint(size_t index) { FUAssert(index < GetRigidConstraintCount(), return NULL); return rigidConstraints.at(index); }
00058     const FCDPhysicsRigidConstraint* GetRigidConstraint(size_t index) const { FUAssert(index < GetRigidConstraintCount(), return NULL); return rigidConstraints.at(index); }
00059     inline FCDPhysicsRigidConstraint* FindRigidConstraintFromSid(const fm::string& sid) { return const_cast<FCDPhysicsRigidConstraint*>(const_cast<const FCDPhysicsModel*>(this)->FindRigidConstraintFromSid(sid)); }
00060     const FCDPhysicsRigidConstraint* FindRigidConstraintFromSid(const fm::string& sid) const;
00061     FCDPhysicsRigidConstraint* AddRigidConstraint();
00062 
00063     // Create a copy of this physics model, with the vertices overwritten
00064     virtual FCDEntity* Clone(FCDEntity* clone = NULL, bool cloneChildren = false) const;
00065 
00066     // Read in the <physics_model> node of the COLLADA document
00067     virtual bool LoadFromXML(xmlNode* node);
00068 
00069     // Write out the <physics_model> node to the COLLADA XML tree
00070     virtual xmlNode* WriteToXML(xmlNode* parentNode) const;
00071 };
